data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Stadium Burn
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flame Blast
attacks.text: Does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Double Fire
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Flame Burst
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Flare Recharge
attacks.text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Water's Power
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Water Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Water Fling
attacks.text: Put 3 Water Energy from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Hand Fling
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of cards in your hand.

data.flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

data.name: Simisear

attacks.name: Fling Fire
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

data.name: Simisear V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bursting Power
attacks.text: You may attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Flare Juggling
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Simisear V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bursting Power
attacks.text: You may attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Flare Juggling
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Simisear VSTAR
rules: VSTAR rule: When your Pokémon VSTAR is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Fireball Fever
attacks.text: You may discard up to 5 cards from the top of your deck. This attack does 40 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Ember Star
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy card in your discard pile. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

rules: VSTAR rule: When your Pokémon VSTAR is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Ember Star
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy card in your discard pile. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

data.name: Simisear

abilities.name: Monkey Trio
abilities.text: If you have Simisage, Simisear, and Simipour in play, ignore all Colorless Energy in the costs of attacks used by this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

attacks.name: Double Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage for each heads.
